statements: SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT title, author FROM training_materials WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT content FROM training_materials WHERE material_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT author, creation_date FROM training_materials WHERE material_id = 2;
SELECT title FROM training_materials WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT title, author FROM training_materials ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE title = 'Introduction to SQL';
SELECT material_id, author FROM training_materials WHERE author = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE material_id <= 10;
SELECT title, creation_date FROM training_materials WHERE creation_date < '2022-03-01';
SELECT author, content FROM training_materials WHERE creation_date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT material_id, author FROM training_materials WHERE author LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE author = 'Jane Doe' OR author = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE title LIKE '%Query%';
SELECT material_id, title, author FROM training_materials WHERE material_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE content LIKE '%database%';
SELECT material_id, title, creation_date FROM training_materials WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT author, creation_date FROM training_materials WHERE content LIKE '%tutorial%';
SELECT title, author FROM training_materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT material_id, title, author FROM training_materials WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, content FROM training_materials WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT material_id, title FROM training_materials WHERE author = 'Jane Doe' AND creation_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total_materials FROM training_materials GROUP BY author;
SELECT author, AVG(CHAR_LENGTH(content)) AS avg_content_length FROM training_materials GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT author, MAX(creation_date) AS latest_date FROM training_materials GROUP BY author;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total_materials, AVG(CHAR_LENGTH(content)) AS avg_content_length FROM training_materials GROUP BY author HAVING total_materials > 1;
SELECT title, content FROM training_materials WHERE material_id IN (1, 5, 10);
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%' AND content LIKE '%database%';
SELECT material_id, title, creation_date FROM training_materials ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT author, DATE(creation_date) AS creation_day FROM training_materials GROUP BY author, creation_day ORDER BY creation_day ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total_materials FROM training_materials WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' GROUP BY author;
SELECT author, MIN(creation_date) AS first_date, MAX(creation_date) AS latest_date FROM training_materials GROUP BY author;
SELECT author, SUM(CHAR_LENGTH(content)) AS total_length FROM training_materials GROUP BY author HAVING total_length > 1000;
SELECT author, AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), creation_date)) AS avg_days_since_creation FROM training_materials GROUP BY author;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total_materials FROM training_materials WHERE creation_date >= '2022-06-01' GROUP BY author;
SELECT author, MIN(material_id) AS first_material_id, MAX(material_id) AS latest_material_id FROM training_materials GROUP BY author;
SELECT title, content, author, DATE_FORMAT(creation_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM training_materials;
SELECT * FROM training_materials;
SELECT id, title FROM training_materials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM training_materials WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, title, last_updated FROM training_materials ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT id, COUNT(*) AS review_count FROM employee_reviews GROUP BY id;
SELECT material_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM employee_reviews GROUP BY material_id;
SELECT employee_id, rating FROM employee_reviews WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT employee_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM employee_reviews GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT review_id, review FROM employee_reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT material_id, COUNT(*) AS review_count FROM employee_reviews GROUP BY material_id HAVING review_count > 5;
SELECT id, title FROM training_materials LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, title FROM training_materials OFFSET 5;
SELECT id, title FROM training_materials LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10;
SELECT id, title FROM training_materials WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE content IS NOT NULL;
SELECT material_id, MAX(rating) AS max_rating FROM employee_reviews GROUP BY material_id;
SELECT material_id, MIN(rating) AS min_rating FROM employee_reviews GROUP BY material_id;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM employee_reviews GROUP BY employee_id HAVING average_rating > 3.5;
SELECT * FROM employee_reviews WHERE review_date = '2022-02-15';
SELECT * FROM training_materials;
SELECT title, content FROM training_materials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM training_materials;
SELECT title, content, last_updated FROM training_materials WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(rating) FROM employee_reviews WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT title, content, employee_id FROM training_materials JOIN employee_reviews ON training_materials.id = employee_reviews.material_id;
SELECT title, content, rating FROM training_materials JOIN employee_reviews ON training_materials.id = employee_reviews.material_id WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(rating) FROM employee_reviews GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT COUNT(*), AVG(rating) FROM employee_reviews GROUP BY material_id;
SELECT title, content, rating FROM training_materials JOIN employee_reviews ON training_materials.id = employee_reviews.material_id WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT title, content, SUM(rating) FROM training_materials JOIN employee_reviews ON training_materials.id = employee_reviews.material_id GROUP BY training_materials.id;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS review_count FROM employee_reviews GROUP BY employee_id HAVING review_count > 3;

SELECT title, content, rating, review_date FROM training_materials JOIN employee_reviews ON training_materials.id = employee_reviews.material_id WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT MAX(rating) FROM employee_reviews WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT MIN(rating) FROM employee_reviews WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT rating FROM employee_reviews WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(DISTINCT material_id) AS materials_reviewed FROM employee_reviews GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT title, content, rating FROM training_materials JOIN employee_reviews ON training_materials.id = employee_reviews.material_id ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT title, content, rating FROM training_materials JOIN employee_reviews ON training_materials.id = employee_reviews.material_id ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT title, content, rating FROM training_materials JOIN employee_reviews ON training_materials.id = employee_reviews.material_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM access_logs;
SELECT employee_id, material_id FROM access_logs;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'metal';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(material_id) FROM materials;
SELECT SUM(employee_id) FROM employees;
SELECT COUNT(material_id) FROM materials;
SELECT AVG(employee_id) FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT MIN(hire_date) FROM employees;
SELECT MAX(access_date) FROM access_logs;
SELECT DISTINCT material_type FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM materials WHERE material_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM materials
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials
SELECT * FROM employees
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees
SELECT * FROM access_logs
SELECT employee_id, material_id, access_date FROM access_logs
SELECT e.employee_name, a.access_date FROM employees e INNER JOIN access_logs a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id
SELECT m.material_name, a.access_date FROM materials m INNER JOIN access_logs a ON m.material_id = a.material_id
SELECT e.employee_name, m.material_name, a.access_date FROM employees e INNER JOIN access_logs a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id INNER JOIN materials m ON a.material_id = m.material_id
SELECT e.employee_name, e.department, COUNT(a.log_id) AS num_accesses FROM employees e INNER JOIN access_logs a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id GROUP BY e.employee_name, e.department
SELECT m.material_name, COUNT(a.log_id) AS num_accesses FROM access_logs a INNER JOIN materials m ON a.material_id = m.material_id GROUP BY m.material_name
SELECT e.employee_name, COUNT(a.log_id) AS num_accesses FROM access_logs a INNER JOIN employees e ON a.employee_id = e.employee_id GROUP BY e.employee_name
SELECT e.employee_name, COUNT(a.log_id) AS num_accesses FROM access_logs a INNER JOIN employees e ON a.employee_id = e.employee_id GROUP BY e.employee_name HAVING COUNT(a.log_id) > 5
SELECT e.employee_name, COUNT(a.log_id) AS num_accesses FROM access_logs a INNER JOIN employees e ON a.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE a.access_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY e.employee_name
SELECT e.employee_name, COUNT(a.log_id) AS num_accesses FROM access_logs a INNER JOIN employees e ON a.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE e.department = 'IT' GROUP BY e.employee_name
SELECT m.material_name, COUNT(a.log_id) AS num_accesses FROM access_logs a INNER JOIN materials m ON a.material_id = m.material_id WHERE a.access_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY m.material_name
SELECT m.material_name, COUNT(a.log_id) AS num_accesses FROM access_logs a INNER JOIN materials m ON a.material_id = m.material_id WHERE m.material_type = 'Tool' GROUP BY m.material_name
SELECT e.employee_name, COUNT(a.log_id) AS num_accesses FROM access_logs a INNER JOIN employees e ON a.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE e.department = 'Accounting' GROUP BY e.employee_name

SELECT e.employee_name, m.material_name, MIN(a.access_date) AS first_access FROM employees e INNER JOIN access_logs a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id INNER JOIN materials m ON a.material_id = m.material_id GROUP BY e.employee_name, m.material_name ORDER BY first_access
SELECT * FROM training_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials;
SELECT material_name, upload_date FROM training_materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_profiles;
SELECT emp_name, emp_email FROM employee_profiles;
SELECT emp_name, emp_department FROM employee_profiles WHERE emp_position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM access_logs;
SELECT material_id, emp_id, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT material_id, emp_id, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE emp_id = 1;
SELECT t.material_name, e.emp_name FROM training_materials t JOIN employee_profiles e ON t.uploaded_by = e.emp_name;
SELECT e.emp_name, f.feedback_content FROM employee_profiles e JOIN feedback f ON e.emp_id = f.emp_id;
SELECT t.material_name, f.feedback_content FROM training_materials t JOIN feedback f ON t.material_id = f.material_id;
SELECT t.material_name, a.access_time, e.emp_name FROM training_materials t JOIN access_logs a ON t.material_id = a.material_id JOIN employee_profiles e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id;
SELECT t.material_name, e.emp_name, f.feedback_content FROM training_materials t LEFT JOIN feedback f ON t.material_id = f.material_id LEFT JOIN employee_profiles e ON f.emp_id = e.emp_id;
SELECT t.material_name, f.feedback_content, a.access_time FROM training_materials t LEFT JOIN feedback f ON t.material_id = f.material_id LEFT JOIN access_logs a ON t.material_id = a.material_id;
SELECT e.emp_name, SUM(CASE WHEN f.material_id = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_feedbacks FROM employee_profiles e LEFT JOIN feedback f ON e.emp_id = f.emp_id GROUP BY e.emp_id;
SELECT emp_name, COUNT(material_id) AS total_accesses FROM employee_profiles ep JOIN access_logs al ON ep.emp_id = al.emp_id GROUP BY ep.emp_id;
SELECT material_name, COUNT(emp_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM training_materials tm JOIN feedback f ON tm.material_id = f.material_id GROUP BY tm.material_id;

SELECT material_name, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, access_time, feedback_date)) AS avg_response_time FROM training_materials t JOIN access_logs a ON t.material_id = a.material_id JOIN feedback f ON t.material_id = f.material_id;

SELECT material_id, COUNT(*) FROM access_logs GROUP BY material_id;
SELECT material_name, upload_date FROM training_materials ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT emp_name, emp_position, COUNT(*) FROM employee_profiles GROUP BY emp_position;
SELECT material_id, COUNT(*) FROM access_logs WHERE access_time > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY material_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT emp_name, emp_position, emp_department FROM employee_profiles WHERE emp_id = ANY (SELECT emp_id FROM feedback);
SELECT material_name, COUNT(*) FROM training_materials JOIN access_logs ON training_materials.material_id = access_logs.material_id GROUP BY material_name;
SELECT emp_name, emp_email, COUNT(*) FROM employee_profiles JOIN feedback ON employee_profiles.emp_id = feedback.emp_id GROUP BY emp_name;
SELECT material_id, MAX(access_time) FROM access_logs GROUP BY material_id;

SELECT employee_id, material_id, progress_percentage FROM training_progress WHERE material_id = 4;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'Python%';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'SQL%'
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials WHERE material_id = 1
SELECT * FROM material_categories JOIN training_materials ON material_categories.category_id = training_materials.material_id
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees JOIN employee_training ON employees.employee_id = employee_training.employee_id
SELECT t.employee_id, t.material_id, p.progress_percentage FROM employee_training t JOIN training_progress p ON t.employee_id = p.employee_id AND t.material_id = p.material_id
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT count(*) AS num_materials FROM training_materials
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees
SELECT m.material_id, m.material_name, e.employee_name FROM training_materials m JOIN employee_training et ON m.material_id = et.material_id JOIN employees e ON et.employee_id = e.employee_id
SELECT AVG(progress_percentage) AS avg_progress FROM training_progress
